Module.Content: <script language="JavaScript" type="text/JavaScript"> <!-- function HDD_Menu(targetpage,selected){ if (selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value!=""){ eval(targetpage+".location='"+selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value+"'");}} //--> </script><select name="Specific Talent" onChange="HDD_Menu('parent',this)" style="color:#000000; background:#F1F345; font-weight:bold;" > <option value="" selected>Specific Talent</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/acoustic-folk-inst">Ac. Folk Inst.</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/arrangement">Arrangement</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/bassist">Bass</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/composition">Composer</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/drums">Drums</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/editor-audio">Editor (Audio)</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/editor-video">Editor (Video)</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/guitar">Guitar</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/harmonica">Harmonica</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/horn">Horns</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/keys">Keys</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/lyrics">Lyrics</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/mix-master">Mix/Master</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/orchestra-instruments">Orchestra Inst.</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/producer">Producer</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/home/talent-profiles/singers">Singer</option></select>
